DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate effect NTRA-2112 intestinal malabsorption preterm infant .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Efficacy Safety NTRA-2112 Intestinal Malabsorption Preterm Infants
DOC.detailed_description: The study ass efficacy safety NTRA-2112 intestinal malabsorption preterm infant compare placebo
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Male female preterm infant 26 32 week gestation . Gestational age matching ( ±2 week ) maternal date and/or early antenatal ultrasound 2 . Birth weight ≥ 500g 3 . Singleton twin birth Exclusion Criteria 1 . Complete enteral feeding
